frameset.edef: multi-word expression: without blinking an eye - or caring

example.parse: (S (CONJ ف) (NP-TPC-2 (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM تجار) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN السياسة))) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذين)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP اعتادوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC النظر)) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN المعاصي)))) (NP-MNR (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC دون) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تطرف) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (PRON_3MP هم))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_NOM عين))))))))))
